node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Last week, Jon had an idea for a discussion topic - What makes a good meeting. So that’s what we spend the majority of this episode talking about. Stan is also headed on vacation this week, he gives a little preview of what he’ll be up to. Stan lays out 3 types of…

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, This week we start off with yet another correction, this time Jon messed up. We have a couple of new reviews first a listener reviewed us on iTunes, then Jon reviews a milkshake. We talk about the jam-packed WWDC keynote and highlights from the announcements…
